title: The Worlds  *Most*  POWERFUL Truck: The F-150 Lightning
description: Ford has taken Electric Vehicles to the next level. Lets hope everyone else can keep up. The new F-150 lightning can power an average home in the USA for THREE WHOLE DAYS.
